trans-unit.source: Represents a control with a single piece of content of any type.
trans-unit.target: 代表具有單一內容的任何類型的控制項。

trans-unit.source: The ContentControl can contain any type of common language runtime object (such as a string or a <xref:System.DateTime> object) or a <xref:System.Windows.UIElement> object (such as a <xref:System.Windows.Shapes.Rectangle> or a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Panel>).
trans-unit.target: ContentControl 可以包含任何類型的 common language runtime 物件 (例如字串或<xref:System.DateTime>物件) 或<xref:System.Windows.UIElement>物件 (例如<xref:System.Windows.Shapes.Rectangle>或<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Panel>)。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Panel> </xref:System.Windows.Shapes.Rectangle> </xref:System.Windows.UIElement> </xref:System.DateTime>

trans-unit.source: This enables you to add rich content to controls such as <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button> and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.CheckBox>.
trans-unit.target: 這可讓您將豐富的內容加入至控制項，例如<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button>和<xref:System.Windows.Controls.CheckBox>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.CheckBox> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button>

trans-unit.source: The following illustration shows four buttons whose <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.Content%2A> property is set to one of the following: - A string.
trans-unit.target: 下圖顯示四個按鈕的<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.Content%2A>屬性設定為下列其中之一:-字串。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.Content%2A>

trans-unit.source: - A <xref:System.DateTime> object.
trans-unit.target: -A<xref:System.DateTime>物件。</xref:System.DateTime>

trans-unit.source: - A <xref:System.Windows.UIElement> object.
trans-unit.target: -A<xref:System.Windows.UIElement>物件。</xref:System.Windows.UIElement>

trans-unit.source: - A <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Panel> control that contains other <xref:System.Windows.UIElement> objects.
trans-unit.target: -A<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Panel>包含其他控制項<xref:System.Windows.UIElement>物件。</xref:System.Windows.UIElement> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Panel>

trans-unit.source: ![Four buttons](~/add/media/controlcontentmodelbuttons.PNG "Four buttons") Four buttons with different types of content AContentControl has a limited default style.
trans-unit.target: ![四個按鈕](~/add/media/controlcontentmodelbuttons.PNG "四個按鈕")與不同類型的內容 AContentControl 四個按鈕具有有限的預設樣式。

trans-unit.source: If you want to enhance the appearance of the control, you can create a new <xref:System.Windows.DataTemplate>.
trans-unit.target: 如果您想要加強控制項的外觀，您可以建立新的<xref:System.Windows.DataTemplate>。</xref:System.Windows.DataTemplate>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Data Templating Overview](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[資料範本化概觀](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: Another typical scenario is to use the ContentControl to show more information about an item selected in an <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl> control.
trans-unit.target: 另一個典型的案例是要顯示有關選取之項目的詳細資訊時，用於 ContentControl<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl>控制項。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [How to: Bind to a Collection and Display Information Based on Selection](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[How to︰ 繫結至集合並顯示選取項目基礎資訊](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: Dependency properties for this control might be set by the control’s default style.
trans-unit.target: 對這個控制項的相依性屬性可能會設定控制項的預設樣式。

trans-unit.source: If a property is set by a default style, the property might change from its default value when the control appears in the application.
trans-unit.target: 如果屬性設定為預設樣式，屬性可能會變更其預設值時該控制項會出現在應用程式中。

trans-unit.source: The default style is determined by which desktop theme is used when the application is running.
trans-unit.target: 預設樣式是由決定由哪個桌面主題時，會使用應用程式正在執行。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Default WPF Themes](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=158252).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[預設 WPF 佈景主題](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=158252)。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: Adds a specified object as the child of a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 將指定的物件新增為子系<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The object to add.
trans-unit.target: 要加入的物件。

trans-unit.source: Adds a specified text string to a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 將指定的文字字串至<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The string to add.
trans-unit.target: 要加入的字串。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the content of a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定的內容<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Because the Content property is of type <xref:System.Object>, there are no restrictions on what you can put in a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl>.
trans-unit.target: 因為內容屬性為型別<xref:System.Object>，則您可以放入<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl>沒有限制</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: The Content is displayed by a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter>, which is in the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate> of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl>.
trans-unit.target: 內容會顯示<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter>，但其內容中<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>的<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl>。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter>

trans-unit.source: Every <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl> type in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] has a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter> in its default <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>.
trans-unit.target: 每個<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl>輸入[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]已<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter>在其預設<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl>

trans-unit.source: For more information about how the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter> displays Content, see <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter>.
trans-unit.target: 如需有關如何<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter>顯示內容，請查看<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter>

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None| ## XAML Attribute Usage ``` ``` ## XAML Property Element Usage ``` ``` ## XAML Values `Content` Text or a single object.
trans-unit.target: # # 相依性屬性資訊 | | | |-|-| |識別項欄位 || |中繼資料屬性設定為`true`|None | # # XAML 屬性使用方式``` ``` # # XAML 屬性項目用法``` ``` # # XAML 值`Content`文字或單一物件。

trans-unit.source: An object that contains the control's content.
trans-unit.target: 物件，包含控制項的內容。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.Content*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 識別<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.Content*>相依性屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.Content*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a composite string that specifies how to format the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.Content*> property if it is displayed as a string.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定複合字串，指定如何格式化<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.Content*>屬性就會顯示為字串，如果。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.Content*>

trans-unit.source: ContentStringFormat can be a predefined, composite, or custom string format.
trans-unit.target: ContentStringFormat 可以是預先定義、 複合的或自訂字串格式。

trans-unit.source: For more information about string formats, see [Formatting Types](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需字串格式的詳細資訊，請參閱[格式化型別](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: If you set the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.ContentTemplate%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.ContentTemplateSelector%2A> property of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl>, the ContentStringFormat property is ignored.
trans-unit.target: 如果您設定<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.ContentTemplate%2A>或<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.ContentTemplateSelector%2A>屬性<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl>，則會忽略 ContentStringFormat 屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.ContentTemplateSelector%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.ContentTemplate%2A>

trans-unit.source: A composite string that specifies how to format the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.Content*> property if it is displayed as a string.
trans-unit.target: 複合字串，指定如何格式化<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.Content*>屬性就會顯示為字串，如果。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.Content*>

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.ContentStringFormat*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 識別<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.ContentStringFormat*>相依性屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.ContentStringFormat*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the data template used to display the content of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定用來顯示內容的資料範本<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Set this property to a <xref:System.Windows.DataTemplate> to specify the appearance of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl>.
trans-unit.target: 將此屬性設定為<xref:System.Windows.DataTemplate>指定<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl>外觀</xref:System.Windows.DataTemplate>

trans-unit.source: For more information on data templates, see [Data Templating Overview](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需有關資料範本的詳細資訊，請參閱[資料範本化概觀](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: ## XAML Attribute Usage ``` ``` ## XAML Values *resourceExtension* A markup extension that identifies how to reference the template resource, either `StaticResource` or `DynamicResource`.
trans-unit.target: # # XAML 屬性使用方式``` ``` # # XAML 值*resourceExtension*識別如何將參考的範本資源，可能是標記延伸`StaticResource`或`DynamicResource`。

trans-unit.source: See [XAML Resources](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 請參閱[XAML 資源](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: *styleResourceKey* The key that identifies the requested template selector.
trans-unit.target: *styleResourceKey*識別要求的範本選擇器的索引鍵。

trans-unit.source: The key refers to an existing resource in a <xref:System.Windows.ResourceDictionary>.
trans-unit.target: 索引鍵參考<xref:System.Windows.ResourceDictionary>.</xref:System.Windows.ResourceDictionary>中現有的資源

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Property element syntax is technically possible, but not recommended.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > 屬性項目語法是可行，但不是建議。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Inline Styles and Templates](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[內嵌樣式和樣板](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
trans-unit.target: # # 相依性屬性資訊 | | | |-|-| |識別項欄位 || |中繼資料屬性設定為`true`|None |

trans-unit.source: A data template.
trans-unit.target: 資料範本。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.ContentTemplate*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 識別<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.ContentTemplate*>相依性屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.ContentTemplate*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a template selector that enables an application writer to provide custom template-selection logic.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定範本選擇器，可讓應用程式寫入器，以提供自訂的範本選取邏輯。

trans-unit.source: Typically, you create a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataTemplateSelector> when you have more than one <xref:System.Windows.DataTemplate> for the same type of objects and you want to supply your own logic to choose a <xref:System.Windows.DataTemplate> to apply based on the properties of each data object.
trans-unit.target: 通常您會建立<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataTemplateSelector>有一個以上<xref:System.Windows.DataTemplate>相同類型的物件，而且您想要提供您自己選擇的邏輯<xref:System.Windows.DataTemplate>套用根據每個資料物件的屬性。</xref:System.Windows.DataTemplate> </xref:System.Windows.DataTemplate> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataTemplateSelector>

trans-unit.source: Note that if you have objects of different types you can set the <xref:System.Windows.DataTemplate.DataType%2A> property on the <xref:System.Windows.DataTemplate>.
trans-unit.target: 請注意，是否您有不同類型的物件您可以設定<xref:System.Windows.DataTemplate.DataType%2A>於<xref:System.Windows.DataTemplate>。</xref:System.Windows.DataTemplate>屬性</xref:System.Windows.DataTemplate.DataType%2A>

trans-unit.source: If you do that, then there is no need to create a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataTemplateSelector>.
trans-unit.target: 如果您這樣做，就不需要建立<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataTemplateSelector>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataTemplateSelector>

trans-unit.source: Furthermore, if you have objects of the same type but with different properties, you can also consider using a <xref:System.Windows.DataTrigger> or a data converter.
trans-unit.target: 此外，如果您有物件類型相同，但具有不同的屬性時，您也可以考慮使用<xref:System.Windows.DataTrigger>或資料轉換。</xref:System.Windows.DataTrigger>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Data Templating Overview](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[資料範本化概觀](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: To create a template selector, create a class that inherits from <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataTemplateSelector> and override the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataTemplateSelector.SelectTemplate%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 若要建立範本選擇器，請建立繼承自類別<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataTemplateSelector>並覆寫<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataTemplateSelector.SelectTemplate%2A>方法。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataTemplateSelector.SelectTemplate%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataTemplateSelector>

trans-unit.source: After your class is defined, you can assign an instance of the class to the template selector property of your element.
trans-unit.target: 您的類別定義之後，您可以指派給您的項目範本選取器屬性的類別的執行個體。

trans-unit.source: If both the ContentTemplateSelector and the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.ContentTemplate%2A> properties are set, then this property is ignored.
trans-unit.target: 如果這兩個 ContentTemplateSelector 和<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.ContentTemplate%2A>設定的屬性，則會忽略這個屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.ContentTemplate%2A>

trans-unit.source: ## XAML Attribute Usage ``` ``` ## XAML Values *ResourceExtension* A markup extension that identifies how to reference the template resource, either `StaticResource` or `DynamicResource`.
trans-unit.target: # # XAML 屬性使用方式``` ``` # # XAML 值*ResourceExtension*識別如何將參考的範本資源，可能是標記延伸`StaticResource`或`DynamicResource`。

trans-unit.source: See [XAML Resources](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 請參閱[XAML 資源](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: *TemplateSelectorKey* The key that identifies the requested template selector.
trans-unit.target: *TemplateSelectorKey*識別要求的範本選擇器的索引鍵。

trans-unit.source: The key refers to an existing resource in a <xref:System.Windows.ResourceDictionary>.
trans-unit.target: 索引鍵參考<xref:System.Windows.ResourceDictionary>.</xref:System.Windows.ResourceDictionary>中現有的資源

trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.target: 取得值，指出是否<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl"></xref>包含內容。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.Content%2A> property is `null`, this property returns `false`.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.Content%2A>屬性是`null`，這個屬性會傳回`false`。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.Content%2A>

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
trans-unit.target: # # 相依性屬性資訊 | | | |-|-| |識別項欄位 || |中繼資料屬性設定為`true`|None |

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl"></xref> has content; otherwise <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl"></xref>具有內容，否則<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.target: 取得列舉值至內容控制項的邏輯子元素。

trans-unit.target: 列舉值。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.target: 時呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.Content*>屬性變更。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.Content*>

trans-unit.source: The old value of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.ContentTemplate*> property.
